column2: My loyal subjects, my brave Germans! I, [From.GetTitledName] by grace of God your Kaiser do hereby decree that from this day onwards, German nation shall no longer be weighed down by name of a nation destroyed by them. German Empire is a reality.
Germans, my brothers! I, [From.GetTitledName] your former Kaiser declare that from this day onwards, Every German man and woman is free, as it was in the days before Romans came.
May God give us strength to retain our Freedom
